title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: There is a bug in the Photon version where the popup menu in the Java editor ruler does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler.
OB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, the expected popup menu to add breakpoints/marks does not appear.
EB: The expected behavior is that when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, a popup menu should appear to allow for adding breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1) Open a Java editor. 
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. 
Expected behavior: A popup menu should appear to add breakpoints/marks, etc. However, the popup menu is not appearing in this case.
